columns.player_id: The unique identifier for each player in the database.

columns.player_id: The unique identifier for each player in the database.

columns.height: The height of the player in inches.

columns.throws: The throwing hand of the player (left, right).

columns.final_game: The date of the player's final game in professional baseball.

columns.bbref_id: The unique identifier used for Baseball Reference records.

columns.player_id: The unique identifier for each pitcher in the database.
